title: Your brain rewards you twice per meal: When you eat and when food reaches your stomach

title_detail.value: Your brain rewards you twice per meal: When you eat and when food reaches your stomach

summary: We know a good meal can stimulate the release of the feel-good hormone dopamine, and now a study in humans suggests that dopamine release in the brain occurs at two different times: at the time the food is first ingested and another once the food reaches the stomach.

summary_detail.value: We know a good meal can stimulate the release of the feel-good hormone dopamine, and now a study in humans suggests that dopamine release in the brain occurs at two different times: at the time the food is first ingested and another once the food reaches the stomach.
